titleStmt.title: The judges opinions delivered before His Grace the Lord Chancellor of Ireland, in the cause between John St. Leger, Esq; plaintiff, and John Barret, Esq; defendant Taken by the register of the High Court of Chancery, Saturday the 8th of February, 1678. Present, Lord Chancellor, Lord Chief Justice Booth, Lord Chief Baron, Sir Richard Kennedy, Mr. Justice Johnson, Mr. Justice Jones, Sir Richard Reynell.
titleStmt.author: Jubbes, John.

notesStmt.note: The words "Lord Chancellor, .. Sir Richard Kennedy," are joined by a right brace.
Copy annotated at end in MS., with dates of appeals and judgment.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
